reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and is comfortable, with one noting it's not too loose. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its elegance, with one customer mentioning it's formal enough for weddings, and another noting it has a more expensive look. Additionally, they appreciate its quality, describing it as suitable for formal occasions and excellent for officiating ceremonies, while also praising its flattering design, stretchy fabric, and wonderful feel. Customers also consider it good value for money. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful ideal dress for a plus size figure
items.body: This dress proved to be an excellent choice for officiating a wedding ceremony. Its fabric possessed a delightful softness and stretch, allowing it to gracefully conform to the body's shape. I am plus size with an hour glass shape and it shaped me beautifully. The length was perfect with a heel. I am 5'5. The silhouette created was both elegant and flattering, perfectly suited for the occasion. I loved how the cape flowed and covered my arms. The seam quality was so well done! I received numerous compliments on its sophisticated appearance. I highly recommend this dress for formal events requiring a polished and comfortable ensemble. Perfect value for the money, it was within my budget. Read more
items.author: Susana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded expectations! Comfortable and flattering!
items.body: Curvy girls know it’s hard to cover just the right places, while achieving a flattering silhouette. This dress did this and more! The mermaid shape accentuated the curves in a good way, and the overlay gave a layer of protection and modesty without covering too much. The peekaboo sleeves showed just the right amount of skin, and the length was perfect! (5’4”) The fabric was a beautiful lace pattern giving it a more expensive look, that had wonderful stretch, and a double layer that made sure there was proper coverage. The overlay also does a fabulous drape down the zippered lace back that is lovely. It was easy to wear, comfortable, and formal. I was completely surprised with the quality for such a good price. I ordered others at this price point and returned them because of their cheap, flimsy fabric. For this price, you can beat it! And it’s full length! It will require a steaming to get the wrinkles out, but it was easy to do. I couldn’t be happier! Read more
items.author: Tiffaney Paris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A real winner!
items.body: Beautiful dress! I ordered it for granddaughter's wedding. Fits well, as expected - I purchased my normal 2x (or 20) size, in Black lace with Chiffon cape. I'm 5'2", weigh 200-205, and the lacy fabric hides my tummy well. I also wanted something that would continue to fit right up to the date - whether I gained or lost weight - and this dress had enough stretch to do that comfortably. It was a tough choice, but I ended up returning this one and kept the other version with sequin cape and black dress, mostly because I preferred the sparkly look for this festive occasion. But had I needed a dress for a more sedate occasion, I would have definitely kept it! It's really a well made dress, and a quality look for a lower price. Read more
items.author: Mascha K Fujimoto

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally something that doesn't look like a moomoo
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress it fit so well, great design and did not have some ugly design or animal print on it. Shopping plus size is always hard but this was perfect. I wore it to officiate a wedding and it looked great in the pictures. Quality was great and the material felt wonderful. It had stretch to it so you did not feel like you were being confined. Will definitely be wearing this again. Read more
items.author: Shantaa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large in sizing.
items.body: Beautiful and comfortable material and color. It runs larger than the chart sizing. After ordering the recommended sizing on the size chart, I had to reorder 2 times before finding the most appropriate sizing. Read more
items.author: LuvByrd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 out of 10 highly recommend.
items.body: Loved it. for perspective I am 37, 4'10 and 275 lbs I am hippy, and got a nice sized behind. I normally wear a 24 to 26 (3 to 4) in woman stores like Torrid. I got so many compliments. I am short like short short. The dress was long however it was easily maneuverable, I didn't have to worry about wrinkling. I am in a weird in between size between a 24 and 26. I wish I would have sized down but I bought last minute and that was my fault. I would definitely buy this brand again.... I was not disappointed. The dress could easily be worn all year long. It is not too heavy for a summer wedding either. It was beautifully designed and manufactured..... I will definitely get more use out of this dress. Read more
items.author: Jaye

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: Inexpensively made, but pretty and solid. Read more
items.author: PS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I was very impressed with the dress and received plenty of compliments throughout the evening! I'm 5'8", 235 pounds, top heavy, and usually wear a 20-22. I ordered the dress in a 20 because I didn't want it looking like a loose sack. It fit perfect! The cling was just right with no need to keep adjusting or pulling it down, so I'd say it was a great flow and I loved that the cape flowed down to cover any lumps or bulges that I didn't want displayed. The length came down to just brush the top of my feet. I was very comfortable all night! If I had to find an issue it would be that the neck could have been a bit smaller, I didn't want to keep adjusting so my bra straps weren't showing so I took 2 small safety pins and pinned the dress in place to my bra, problem solved! Perfect!! Read more
items.author: Renea the Book Lover

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Haze Blue, White, Purple, Burgundy, Dusty Pink, Sage Green, Black, Champagne, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
